message: Let's split it 50/50 to start. Your turn!
I'll give you 400k, but I want 600k for myself. It's a fair compromise!
I'll give you a bit less, but I'm still looking for a fair split. Your turn!
I'll give you a bit more, but I'm not going to give up too much. I still want a decent share!
I'm willing to give you a smaller share, but I need a better deal for myself. This is my final offer, I think.
